"Matter Board":
"Matter Board

The Matter Board serves as a guide to move the game's story
along. Complete each Matter on the Board by acquiring the items dropped by the specified enemies.

When you complete a Matter hunt, the adjacent Matter will be unlocked. Keep going until you reach a breakthrough, which reveals the next story development.

See the Online Manual below for more information:
<&URL pso2_players_manual_preparations_quest_matterboard>"
